title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python library to run Llama-2, Code Llama, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models, written in SvelteKit.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Node CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick prompting and model ops.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for integrating Ollama models into Spring Boot or desktop apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API for Rails and scripting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for CPU/GPU inference of Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that uses Ollama models and remembers conversation context.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes for fine-tuning, quantizing, and deploying custom models with Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models through admin and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot server using Ollama for private or group chats with per-user model prefs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to servers with slash commands and moderation hooks.
